mainHero.title: We fix,
mainHero.subtitle: without you leaving your car.
mainHero.description: KaarFix offers a smart, hassle-free bumper repair service in Karachi. We temporarily replace your damaged bumper, repair the original at our workshop, and return to reinstall it — saving you time, stress, and effort. Trusted service right at your doorstep.

items.title: We Come to You
items.description: No more workshop visits. Our team comes to your location, removes the damaged bumper, and installs a temporary one so you’re never stuck.

items.title: Repair & Reinstall
items.description: We take your bumper to our workshop for expert repair and painting. Once it’s ready, we come back and reinstall it on your car — like it was never damaged.

features.title: Why Choose KaarFix?
features.subtitle: Smart solutions for busy car owners
features.description: We know your time is valuable. That’s why KaarFix brings a modern approach to car bumper repair — no queues, no workshop visits, just fast, professional service at your doorstep.

items.name: Doorstep Pickup & Install
items.description: We remove your damaged bumper and install a temporary one — all at your home or office.

items.name: Keep Driving with Ease
items.description: No downtime. Use your car with our temporary bumper while the original is being repaired.

items.name: Workshop-Quality Repairs
items.description: We repair and repaint your bumper using professional tools for a like-new finish.

items.name: Return & Reinstall
items.description: Once your bumper is ready, we return and reinstall it — without you ever leaving home.

items.name: Premium
items.priceDetails: for heavy damage or full repaint

sections.name: No Workshops
sections.content: At KaarFix, our goal is to simplify car repairs for busy people. We believe that car maintenance shouldn't be a hassle, which is why we bring professional bumper repair right to your doorstep.

sections.name: Trusted Service
sections.content: Our team visits your location, removes your damaged bumper, and installs a temporary one so you stay mobile. We then repair and repaint your bumper at our workshop and return to reinstall it — easy and stress-free.

sections.name: Easy Repairs
sections.content: We focus on middle-class car owners in Karachi who want convenience, trust, and quality without the workshop runaround. Whether you’re at home or at work, we come to you.
